data.text:
The usual search for a hotel via Tripadvisor bought us to decide on this property.  At a cost of around Â£210 per night for our three night stay it was a little on the expensive side but we felt we got a pretty decent deal.

A pretty large bedroom/living area with both being more than comfortable and gave us a good nights sleep in the Queen Bed.  This 'Deluxe Studio' with a small kitchenette area with a microwave, fridge and toaster.  The Bathroom was also clean and had everything you would need.

All in all a great stay in a fantastic city, a little on the pricey side but the room itself was faultless.
data.title: Three Night Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Stevie,

Thank you for your nice review and for sharing your comments for other visitors to see.

We are glad that you had a nice experience with us, and enjoyed our place and the city.

Hope to see you again in a near future!

Marc Camps
GM
owner_response.author: Capri By Fraser Capri By Fraser

data.text:
Great apartment to stay with a family. We had a separate room, so more than enough room for all our luggage, etc. The room was clean and serviced every 3 days. But the best thing I liked was that I could do the families washing! (we had been travelling for a while and have an 8 yr old who can't seem to keep clothes clean :) ) Staff were super friendly also.
The only down point was the location, this hotel is (I think) in the financial distract so that there isn't really a lot going on around this area for first time travellers to Barcelona. The area is safe though. The beach is about a 30min walk away and about the same time to the city centre/La Rambla. The train station, Marina, is the closet and around about a 5min walk
data.title: Big room and clean

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pipfanto,

Thank you for your recent stay in our hotel in your recent visit to Barcelona, and for the comments!

It is nice to see that you liked our place and most of all, the service provided by our people. Just let us point out that the district is not a financial one but a mix of residential and renovated area since the Olympics took place in Barcelona. As you say, it is a super safe zone in the city, only three metro stops to the city center, which makes of it a strategic place to stay!

Kind regards from wonderful Barcelona,

Marc Camps
GM
owner_response.author: Capri By Fraser Capri By Fraser

data.text:
Oddly basic hotel, with slow service and infrequent cleaning. 
Staff were inexperienced and unhelpful when dealing with simple requests.
Questionable electrics in the room too, including the bathroom socket.
data.title: Not a great experience!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

We are sad to see that we did not fullfill your expectations. We take your comments as an opportunity to improve our services, and they will be forwarded to the involved departments to take the measures to correct the mentioned issues.

On the other hand, the fact that we clean the apartments every three days should not be a surprise to our guests: in all booking confirmations and hotel descriptions, it is said they way we operate.

Thank you again for the stay, and kind regards from Barcelona!

Marc Camps
GM
owner_response.author: Capri By Fraser Capri By Fraser

data.text: A bit deceptive to call this a 4 star hotel. No pool, no daily house keeping, no water in the room, no individual toiletries (large dispensers bolted to the wall as per 3 star Premier Inns). Staff were nice. The 210â‚¬ rate didnâ€™t include breakfast - another reasonable 15â‚¬. Room was very large with microwave and small kitchen. Bed and pillows could have been more comfortable. Shower pressure was ok but no thermostat on the shower mixer so variable temperature. And why do I have to clean the shower head? There was a desk for working but no power outlets nearby for laptops. Had to remove light plug to recharge my phone and iPad. Only stayed 2 nights for work. Really didnâ€™t feel it met the quality Iâ€™d expect for the rating and price. This isnâ€™t the center of Barcelona.
data.title: Cutting corners and costs  but not prices

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Steve,

We sincerely appreciate your recent stay at our establishment, and we're grateful for the feedback you've shared with us.

We are thrilled to see that you appreciated the exceptional service provided by our dedicated staff. They are our most valued asset, and your recognition means a lot to us.

In regard to the swimming pool, we understand the confusion, but it is important to note that we do not have a swimming pool on the premises, a detail that we communicate clearly in all our booking confirmations. Similarly, our cleaning service is scheduled every three days during a guest's stay to provide a balance between comfort and sustainability.

Our choice of Simmons brand beds and pillows reflects our commitment to offering quality and comfortable accommodations. However, we understand that personal preferences can vary when it comes to comfort, and we appreciate your understanding.

We regret that you were not aware of the laptop plug near the desk during your stay. Please do not hesitate to let us know of any specific requirements in the future, and we will do our utmost to ensure your needs are met.

Regarding our location, we are indeed conveniently located just three metro stops away from Catalunya Square. While we may not be in the heart of the city center, we believe our proximity to major attractions offers a balance between accessibility and tranquility that many of our guests appreciate.

Once again, thank you for choosing our establishment for your stay. Your feedback is valuable to us as we continually strive to enhance our guest experience. If you have any further comments or suggestions, please do not hesitate to share them. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Kind regards,

Marc Camps
GM
owner_response.author: Capri By Fraser Capri By Fraser

data.text: We chose this hotel so that we would have some extra space for relaxing and a kitchen to prepare light meals.  We got that PLUS one of the best sleeping spaces ever;  an excellent bed, cool temperatures, nice dark room, perfectly quiet and a big bathroom close at hand.  This is a modern hotel and it lacks charm, but makes up for that with comfort.  The desk staff were always friendly and helpful, always with smiles.  The location is not perfect as it is in a business area, but there are two Metro lines close by, plus a good grocery store.  We would stay here again.
data.title: The Best Sleeping Space!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

We are delighted to hear that you had such a positive experience during your stay at our hotel! Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we're pleased that our spacious rooms, well-equipped kitchen, and comfortable sleeping arrangements met your expectations.

We understand that our modern design may not have the same charm as some other places, but we've worked hard to ensure that the comfort and convenience we offer more than compensate for it. It's wonderful to know that our staff's friendly and helpful service left a positive impression on you.

Regarding our location, we're glad you found the nearby Metro lines which take you straight to the city center (only 3 stops to there) and grocery store convenient.

Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future! Your satisfaction is our top priority. ðŸ˜„

Best regards from the Mediterranean blue skyes,

Marc Camps
GM
owner_response.author: Capri By Fraser Capri By Fraser
